#Find Derivatives using R
#f
```{r}
my_expression<-expression(x^2)
x<-3
my_deriv<-D(my_expression,"x")
evaluate<-eval(my_deriv)
evaluate               
```
```{r}
my_expression2<-expression(2*(3*a+2)^4-5)
a<-1.2
my_deriv2<-D(my_expression2,"a")
evaluate2<-eval(my_deriv2)
evaluate2 
```


```{r}
#Getting data from palmerpenguins
data(package='palmerpenguins')

ggplot(penguins, aes(x=bill_length_mm,y=bill_depth_mm, color=species)) +  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "Bill Length Vs. Bill Depth",
       x = "Bill Length (mm)",
       y = "Bill Depth (mm)") 
```

```{r}
head(penguins)

       x = "Species",
```
